description: Trent University Wildlife Sanctuary has multiple trails ranging from approximately 1.5km to 3.45km All the marked trails are looped and return to the parking area at the trail head.Tracks and sign from various species of wildlife can be seen, particularly in the winter with some snow cover.The trails are busy on weekends in good weather and are used by dog walkers, cross country skiers, hikers and outdoor enthusiasts.
directions: University Road, a few hundred meters south of Nassau Mills Rd. Trail head and parking are well marked.
title: Trent University Wildlife Sanctuary
